data.title: Information for the Cannabis Industry: How Tax Applies to Immature Plants, Clones, and Seeds
data.excerpt:
Cultivation Tax
The cultivation tax does not apply to the sale or transfer of immature plants, including clones or seeds.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: California department of tax and fee administration
